summary: This is an email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) regarding a letter to the Office of the Chief Medical Examiner (OCME) concerning Jeffrey Epstein's death. The email indicates OCME requested that this letter and a prior letter be withheld from disclosure, and the office plans to send it by close of business.

events.title: Letter to OCME Regarding Epstein Death
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York drafts and plans to send a letter to the Office of the Chief Medical Examiner concerning Jeffrey Epstein's death, following a request from OCME to withhold this and a prior letter from disclosure.

keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was corresponding with the Office of the Chief Medical Examiner (OCME) regarding Jeffrey Epstein's death.
OCME requested that a letter dated September 9, 2019, and a prior letter be withheld from disclosure.
The email indicates planned communication by close of business on September 9, 2019.
